name: Zombie Pumkin
description:
It is almost time for Halloween and you know what that means. ZOMBIES! so download this fun pumpkin throwing game where you not only get to through pumpkins at zombies but track your level in the game and try to win. You might be wondering the price, well my friend it is actually FREE. So download NOW and go have a happy Halloween

*I KNOW PUMKIN IS SPELT WRONG, IT IS ON PURPOSE*

Controls: Left Mouse Button or Space Bar is to through the pumpkin

If  you would like to see the devlog/video I made about making this check that out here:
